ISceneLight Interface Reference
[SCENE+ Module]

import "sceneplus.idl";

Inheritance diagram for ISceneLight:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

SCENE+ Light.

A Renderee (ISceneRenderee-derived) object that represents the scene's light source. This is an abstract interface, the implementation is available for its derivatives: ISceneLightPoint, ISceneLightDir, ISceneLightSpot.

Being an IKineNode derivative, the light may be put wherever in the kinematical chain.

Remarks:
  • IsReady checks if the light is properly initialised. The initialisation functions are defined in the derived interfaces.
  • see also other rendering-related functions defined in ISceneRenderee.

 Gets the Specular Colour, default value is black (no light).

HRESULT PutSpecularColor (FWCOLOR)
 Puts the Specular Colour, default value is black (no light).

HRESULT PutAmbientColor (FWCOLOR)
